Verses: 1 oru Oivunaalile Pariseyaril Thalaivanaagiya Oruvanudaiya Veettile Avar Pojanam Pannumpadikkup Poyirundhaar.
2 appozhudhu Neerkkovai Viyaadhiyulla Oru Manushan Avarukku Munbaaga Irundhaan. Enna Seyvaarovendru Janangal Avar Mel Nokkamaayirundhaargal.
3 yesu Niyaayasaasdhirigalaiyum Pariseyaraiyum Paarththu: Oivunaalile Sosdhamaakkukiradhu Niyaayamaa Endru Kettaar.
4 adharku Avargal Pesaamalirundhaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Avanai Azhaiththu, Sosdhamaakki, Anuppivittu,
5 avargalai Nokki: Ungalil Oruvanudaiya Kazhudhaiyaavadhu Erudhaavadhu Oivunaalil Thuravile Vizhundhaal, Avan Adhai Udane Thookkividaano Endraar.
6 adharku Uththaravusolla Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru.
7 virundhukku Azhaikkappattavargal Pandhiyil Mudhanmaiyaana Idangalaith Therindhukondadhai Avar Paarththu, Avargalukku Oru Uvamaiyaich Sonnaar:
8 oruvanaal Kaliyaanaththukku Nee Azhaikkappattirukkumpodhu, Pandhiyil Mudhanmaiyaana Idaththil Utkaaraadhe; Unnilum Ganamullavan Oruvelai Avanaal Azhaikkappattiruppaan.
9 appozhudhu Unnaiyum Avanaiyum Azhaiththavan Unnidaththil Vandhu: Ivarukku Idankodu Enbaan; Appozhudhu Nee Vetkaththode Thaazhndha Idaththirkup Pogavendiyadhaayirukkum.

10 nee Azhaikkappattirukkumpodhu, Poi, Thaazhndha Idaththil Utkaaru; Appozhudhu Unnai Azhaiththavan Vandhu: Sinegidhane, Uyarndha Idaththil Vaarum Endru Sollumbodhu, Unnudanekoodap Pandhiyirukkiravargalukku Munbaaga Unakkuk Ganamundaagum.
11 thannaith Thaan Uyarththugiravanevanum Thaazhththappaduvaan, Thannaiththaan Thaazhththugiravan Uyarththappaduvaan Endraar.

12 andriyum Avar Thammai Virundhukku Azhaiththavanai Nokki: Nee Pagalvirundhaavadhu Iraavirundhaavadhu Pannumbodhu, Un Sinegidharaiyaagilum Un Sagodhararaiyaagilum, Un Bandhu Janangalaiyaagilum, Aisuvariyamulla Ayalakaththaaraiyaagilum Azhaikkavendaam; Azhaiththaal Avargalum Unnai Azhaippaargal, Appozhudhu Unakkup Badhilukkup Badhil Seydhadhaagum.
13 nee Virundhupannumpodhu Ezhaigalaiyum Oonaraiyum Sappaanigalaiyum Kurudaraiyum Azhaippaayaaga.
14 appozhudhu Nee Baakkiyavaanaayiruppaai; Avargal Unakkup Badhil Seyyamaattaargal; Needhimaangalin Uyirththezhudhalil Unakkup Badhil Seyyappadum Endraar.
15 avarodekoodap Pandhiyirundhavargalil Oruvan Ivaigalaik Kettapozhudhu, Avarai Nokki: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Bojanampannugiravan Baakkiyavaan Endraar.
16 adharku Avar: Oru Manushan Periyavirundhai Aayaththampanni, Anegarai Azhaippiththaan.
17 virundhu Velaiyil Than Oozhiyakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Azhaikkappattavargalidaththil Poi, Ellaam Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu, Vaarungal, Endru Sollendru Avanai Anuppinaan.
18 avargalellaarum Pokkuchsollath Thodanginaargal. Oruvan: Oru Vayalaikkonden, Naan Agaththiyamaaippoi, Adhaip Paarkkavendum, Ennai Mannikkumbadi Vendikkollugiren Endraan.
19 veroruvan: Aindhermaadu Konden, Adhaich Sodhiththup Paarkkumpadi Pogiren, Ennai Mannikkumpadi Vendikkollugiren Endraan.
20 veroruvan: Pennai Vivaagam Panninen, Adhinaal Naan Varakkoodaadhu Endraan.

21 andha Oozhiyakkaaran Vandhu, Ivaigalaith Than Ejamaanukku Ariviththaan; Appozhudhu Veettejamaan Kobamadaindhu, Than Oozhiyakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Pattanaththin Therukkalilum Veedhigalilum Seekkiramaaippoi, Ezhaigalaiyum Oonaraiyum Sappaanigalaiyum Kurudaraiyum Inge Koottikkonduvaa Endraan.
22 oozhiyakkaaran Appadiye Seydhu: Aandavare, Neer Kattalaiyittabadi Seydhaayitru, Innum Idam Irukkiradhu Endraan.
23 appozhudhu Ejamaan Oozhiyakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Peruvazhigalilum Veligalarugilum Poi, En Veetu Niraiyumpadiyaaga Janangalai Ulle Varumpadi Varundhik Koottikkonduvaa;
24 azhaikkappattirundha Andha Manusharil Oruvanaagilum En Virundhai Rusipaarppadhillai Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraan Endru Sonnaar.
25 pinbu Anega Janangal Avarodekoodap Pirayaanamaaip Pogaiyil, Avargalidamaai Avar Thirumpippaarththu:
26 yaadhoruvan Ennidaththil Vandhu, Than Thagappanaiyum Thaayaiyum Manaiviyaiyum Pillaigalaiyum Sagodharanaiyum Sagodharigalaiyum, Than Jeevanaiyum Verukkaavittaal Enakkuch Seeshanaayirukkamaattaan.
27 than Siluvaiyaich Sumandhukondu Enakkup Pinsellaadhavan Enakkuch Seeshanaayirukkamaattaan.
28 ungalil Oruvan Oru Koburaththaik Katta Manadhaayirundhu,
29 asdhibaaram Pottapinbu Mudikkath Thiraaniyillaamarponaal, Paarkkiravargalellaarum:

30 indha Manushan Kattaththodangi Mudikkath Thiraaniyillaamarponaan Endru Sollith Thannaip Pariyaasampannaadhapadikku, Adhaik Kattith Theerkkiradharkuth Thanakku Nirvaagamundo Illaiyo Endru Munbu Avan Utkaarndhu Sellunjelavaik Kanakkuppaaraamaliruppaano?

31 andriyum Oru Raajaa Matroru Raajaavode Yuththanjeyyap Pogirapodhu, Thanmel Irupadhinaayiram Sevagarode Varugira Avanaith Thaan Padhinaayiram Sevakaraikkondu Edhirkkak Koodumo Koodaadho Endru Munbu Utkaarndhu Aalosanaipannaamaliruppaano?
32 koodaadhendru Kandaal, Matravan Innum Thooraththilirukkumbodhe, Sdhaanaabadhigalai Anuppi Samaadhaanaththukkaanavaigalaik Kettukkolvaane.
33 appadiye Ungalil Evanaagilum Thanakku Undaanavaigalaiyellaam Veruththuvidaavittaal Avan Enakkuch Seeshanaayirukkamaattaan.
34 uppu Nalladhudhaan, Uppu Saaramatrupponaal Edhinaal Saaramaakkappadum?
35 adhu Nilaththukkaagilum Eruvukkaagilum Udhavaadhu, Adhai Veliye Kottippoduvaargal. Ketkiradharkuk Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endraar.
